mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Paganel, Pierre, 1745-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Is dedicating to him an historical essay on the French revolution; French police have made it impossible for him to sell this book; his copies have been seized; was about to send one copy by the help of the U.S. consul to Jefferson hopes Jefferson will find the different parts which were ordered; hopes he will acknowledge receipt.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1810 November 19, n.p. to Thomas Jefferson, n.p.
